person goes home - a man goes home
person leaves home - a man leaves home
visitors arrive - visitors come to the house
person goes up/down stairs or walks past stairs - go up stairs/go down stairs/walk past stairs
person plays with pets - playing with pets
fighting - fighting
eating a meal - have a meal/eat
watering plants - water the plant

making a phone call, playing the piano, playing the guitar, playing drums, reading/books, horseback riding, riding a bike, running, walking, jumping, sleeping, taking a photo, using the computer - make a phone call, play the piano, play the guitar, play drum, reading, horseback riding, ride bike, running, walking, jump, sleep, take a photo, using the computer
dogs barking/cats meowing for more than 2 minutes (distinguish between dogs and cats) - dogs barking/cats meowing
dog/cat runs out the door (distinguish between dogs and cats) - the dog ran out the door/the cat ran out the door
dog/cat jumps on the couch (distinguish between dogs and cats) - cat is on the couch/dog is on the couch
dog/cat causes mischief in the house (distinguish between dogs and cats) - dog mess up the house/cat mess up the house
car comes home/leaves home - car back home/car leave home
car parks in the garage - a car is parking in the garage
car horn honking - honk the horn
types of cars passing by the door, involving car types. a car passed by the door. car types: car, fire truck, ambulance, truck, police car
someone approaches the car/someone is stealing the car - someone approaches the car/someone's stealing the car
door opens - door is open
door closes - door is closed
package delivery - package is delivered
outdoor garbage collection - garbage removal
falling event - a man is fall down
getting off the bed event - a man get off the bed
